title: GDG DevFest NYC 2016 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest NYC 2016 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in New York City!

title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: New York City Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the fifth annual GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in New York carefully crafted by the GDG community! The event will take place on **22-23rd of October** in **New York City**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest New York City 2017 announced! The 5th edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in New York City will take center stage on **Ocotober 22-23** in the greatest city in the world. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](http://devfestnyc.com/cfp).
